mapper.sql: ng_id, ng_pac_id, sz_name, sz_addr, nt_gender, nt_age, sz_mobile, ng_user_id, ng_dev_id, ng_ind_doc, nt_row_version
mapper.select:
SELECT dp.ng_id as ng_id, dp.ng_dev_id as ng_dev_id, dp.ng_user_id as ng_user_id, dp.sz_name as sz_name, dp.nt_gender as nt_gender, dp.sz_addr as sz_addr, dp.nt_age as nt_age, dp.sz_mobile as sz_mobile, dp.tx_epicrisis as tx_epicrisis, sr.sz_caption as sz_caption FROM dat_pacient_t dp,sys_user_t su,sys_region_t sr WHERE su.nt_row_version > 0 and su.ng_id = dp.ng_user_id and sr.ng_id = su.ng_region_id
and dp.ng_dev_id in (#{devIds})
mapper.insert: insert into dat_pacient_t (ng_id, ng_pac_id, sz_name, sz_addr, nt_gender, nt_age, sz_mobile, ng_user_id, ng_dev_id, ng_ind_doc, nt_row_version, tx_comment, tx_epicrisis, bo_sample, bo_learn ) values (#{ngId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ngPacId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{szName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ntGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ntAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{szMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ngUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ngDevId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ngIndDoc,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{txComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{txEpicrisis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{boSample,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{boLearn,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} )

mapper.update:
update dat_pacient_t
ng_pac_id = #{ngPacId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sz_name = #{szName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sz_addr = #{szAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nt_gender = #{ntGender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nt_age = #{ntAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sz_mobile = #{szMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ng_user_id = #{ngUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ng_dev_id = #{ngDevId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ng_ind_doc = #{ngIndDoc,jdbcType=BIGINT},
nt_row_version = #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tx_comment = #{txComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tx_epicrisis = #{txEpicrisis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
bo_sample = #{boSample,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
bo_learn = #{boLearn,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where ng_id = #{ngId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dat_pacient_t set ng_pac_id = #{ngPacId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sz_name = #{szName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_addr = #{szAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nt_gender = #{ntGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nt_age = #{ntAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sz_mobile = #{szMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ng_user_id = #{ngUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ng_dev_id = #{ngDevId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ng_ind_doc = #{ngIndDoc,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nt_row_version = #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tx_comment = #{txComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tx_epicrisis = #{txEpicrisis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, bo_sample = #{boSample,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, bo_learn = #{boLearn,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where ng_id = #{ngId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
